name: Jalil Toolkit
author: jewel1994

sections.description: Jalil Toolkit is a helper plugin for jalil theme.This plugin only used for the jalil theme.It is a required plugin for jalil theme.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

First things first, thank you for choosing our Awesome Scrollbar WordPress!

You can install the plugin one of two ways:

Install using FTP

  • Unzip the jalil-toolkit.zip file locally to your machine
  • Connect to your FTP area using your preferred FTP package
  • Upload the jalil-toolkit.zip folder that you extracted from the zip file to the plugin folder of your WordPress installation (wp-content -> plugin)
  • Go to plugin and activate Jalil Toolkit.

Install by WordPress (recommended)

  • Login to your WordPress admin area.
  • Navigate to plugin and click the Add New button at the top.
  • Click the Upload plugin button at the top.
  • Click the Choose File button and locate the jalil-toolkit.zip file on your machine and click the Install Now button.
  • On the basis the plugin installs correctly, click the Activate link.

1.0.0

Released version

compatible with wordpress 4.9.8
